description_html: The Fiore 4-leg swivel chair with wooden shell and arms was awarded the prestigious Red Dot Award: Product Design 2017. At the center of the Fiore Four-Star Swivel model is its simple, ergonomic seat shell produced in bright poly or in a choice of natural oak, walnut or beech veneer. Available un-upholstered, with an upholstered seat pad or fully upholstered, this 4-leg swivel chair combines accessibility, comfort, and a visually clean design.
